General.Name: LET co. Ltd
General.Description: HB Solution Co.,Ltd. develops and supplies analytical solutions for semiconductors, flat panel displays, and electronic materials worldwide. It offers thickness measurement products for fabrication, LCD, optical coating, recordable materials, and other applications; color measurement systems; organic solderability preservative measurement systems; 3D metrology profilers and hybrid 3D interferometers; and spectrometers. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Daejeon, South Korea.
